Components

Our reusable components offer an easy-to-use and accessible solution for forms, navigation, tables and more.

Navigation

Use navigation to visualise the structure of your content and to direct users to the right place.

View navigation
Search field

Use the search component if you need users to be able to search the content of a digital product or service.

View search field
Tables

Use tables to make certain information easier for users to scan and compare.

View tables
Cards

Use cards to break up content on a page, or to group related content together.

View cards
Expansion panels

Use expansion panels when space is limited and the hidden content isn't essential information.

View expansion panels
Buttons

Use buttons to help users complete a task or to carry out an action.

View buttons
Form elements

Use form elements to capture information from the user and to add consistency between products.

View form elements
Dialogue boxes

Use dialogue boxes to highlight specific, often important, information to the user.

View dialogue boxes
Errors

Use error messages to tell a user that there's a problem with the information they have entered.

View errors
